title: The Sims 3 Complete Store - Everything In The  Store - IHUGH
description:
Yet another torrent for the Sims 3. This one has everything on the online store, but i'll just make a quick list.

*Includes 4 Cars.
*Includes All The Sets
*Includes RiverView
*Includes The Single Items
*Includes GOD DAMN EVERYTHING YOU COULD POSSIBLY NEED!

Here is the readme ( I forgot to put it in the .torrent file -.- ).


_____________________________________________________________

An iHugh torrent from ThePirateBay!
_____________________________________________________________


Step 1. Extract the files to your desktop.
Step 2. Move ALL the files into C:DocumentsElectronic ArtsDownloads
Step 3. Open up TS3 Game Launcher.
Step 4. Click Downloads on the left hand side of the game launcher.
Step 5. Click Select All.
Step 6. Click Install.
Step 7. PLAY THE GOD DAMN GAME AND LAUGH AT EA!


_____________________________________________________________

REMEMBER THAT IT IS C: Documents Electronic Arts Downloads
_____________________________________________________________

AND NOT C: Program Files  Electronic Arts
_____________________________________________________________




_____________________________________________________________

If The Download Folder Is Not There, After Making Sure You Have The Right URL, Download This Patch: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4915142/Sims_3.from_RELOADED_to_RAZOR_release_patch_GTI

It Will Update Your Game!
